page.title: 12BRITISH RAIL TEBAY
page.content: My father is a engineer He walks 4 miles 2 days a week along part of the main line (Euston Glasgow) which runs through the village.There are 11 men in his gang.He started when he was 19 because he thought that it would be a steady job.In the winter time if there is a lot of snow my dad is called out for snow duty he has to clean the points.In summer time if the weather is hot my dad checks his stretch of line twice a day to make sure the rails haven't gone soft in the sun.He starts at 0730 to 1600 but on Fridays he comes home at 1500.He also has to work with his gang to keep embankments & hedges tidy,repair walls and fences to prevent animals going on the track. {Sara Murphy aged 10
